mapper.insert: insert into rc_buyer (BUYER_ID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, SEX, MOBILE, IMG_URL, DESCRIPTION, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, SIGN_UP_TIME, WALLET_PWD) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{walletPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update:
update rc_buyer
ACCOUNT = #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMG_URL = #{imgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DESCRIPTION = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_TIME = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SIGN_UP_TIME = #{signUpTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DEl_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=BIT},
WALLET_AMOUNT = #{walletAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
WALLET_PWD = #{walletPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where BUYER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select BUYER_ID, ACCOUNT, PASSWORD, NAME, EMAIL, SEX, MOBILE, IMG_URL, DESCRIPTION, LAST_LOGIN_TIME, SIGN_UP_TIME, DEl_FLAG, WALLET_AMOUNT, WALLET_PWD from rc_buyer where BUYER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
